questions.question: What type of login functionality do you need?

options.label: Implement app login
options.description: Add authentication to protect the CareerJourney app (Touch ID, password, etc.)

options.label: LinkedIn integration
options.description: Add LinkedIn OAuth login to import job applications or profile data

options.label: Cloud sync login
options.description: Add iCloud or other cloud service authentication for data sync

options.label: API service login
options.description: Integrate with a specific job board API (Indeed, Glassdoor, etc.)
